name: The Final Goldberg...
description: You thought The first one was the one I decided on? Boy were you wrong! it was just a DISTRACTION-keeping you from finding out the real project here! THIS is the final project, THIS is what I made, and THIS is what will blow your Mind!Prepare yourselves, for this, might be so awesome, you might go blind because of it! Enjoy...(you don't have to press anything)
